There is a text-to-park parking lot adjacent to Taco Boy at the corner of South Blvd and Whitton St. 8-hr parking for $3. Our Story Taco Boy LoSo, established in January 2024, is our newest addition located in LoSo Station, Charlotte, NC. It features a large mural by Jen Hill, an in-house tortilleria, in-house DJ booth, bar and dining room seating, as well as a sunroom with retractable doors that open to the patio. : We offer validated parking up to 90 minutes. Just turn your ticket into the host stand to be validated. Guests should use lanes 2 and 3 to enter the garage. every day 3-6pm see our menu for rotating selections Happy Hour Attention to our guests with allergies or dietary preferences: We're committed to meeting your needs. Please note, despite our best efforts, cross-contamination can occur. Dishes could come into contact with allergens like dairy, eggs, wheat, soy, tree nuts, peanuts, fish, and shellfish. Crispy and fried offerings are prepared in soybean oil. Kindly be aware that a 3% processing fee applies to all credit card payments. This fee does not apply to debit card transactions. For ease of transaction with parties of eight or more, a 20% suggested tip will be applied to your check. To support this, we provide the availability of transportation after the consumption of alcohol. Please notify your server should you need assistance or a safe ride home and we will gladly make the appropriate arrangements. Alcohol consumption is a personal choice. It is your responsibility to drink responsibly and take appropriate precautions to protect yourself, other patrons, and the community from harm. Our interior is warmly lit with soaring ceilings and authentic Mexican art adorning the walls, while our four-season greenhouse is a go-to spot for soaking up the sunshine in a cheery, green space. We host occasional cornhole tournaments, drag shows, and other festive events that benefit our charitable community partners. Ample parking is available. Our Story Open since 2009, Taco Boy Downtown Charleston presents a colorfully rustic den full of authentic Mexican folk art, as well as a spacious outdoor dining and lawn area that’s perfect for parties large and small. Warm nights bring outdoor DJs and dance parties, while festive events occur year-round that support our charitable partners. Well-behaved and leashed dogs are welcome for outdoor dining. Ample parking is available. Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Folly Beach View Hours View Menu In-House Events Off-Site Catering Events & Happenings Reservations Hours & Location 106 East Ashley Avenue, Folly Beach, SC 29439 843.588.9761 Winter Hours: Thursday – Tuesday, 12pm – 9pm Closed Wednesdays Daily Happy Hour, 3 – 6pm Happenings & Events Charleston Restaurant Week Tequila Tuesday $5 Casa Margaritas Live Entertainment at Club Taco Boy Drag Queen Bingo 1/2 PRICE WINGS ON MONDAY 5th Annual Folly Beach Litter Sweep Daily Happy Hour Our Story Our flagship location opened on Folly Beach in 2006. In 2020, we moved into our current location on East Ashley Avenue, in a colorful three-story hideaway in the trees located just steps away from Center Street and a block off the beach. A main-level dining room can serve large and small groups, while the patio deck and "Octopus bar,” featuring a soaring upcycled octopus by artist Jeff Kopish, provide ample seating for families, friends, and sun-kissed beachgoers. A mid-floor services private parties, while the lantern-lit top-floor bar and rooftop deck serve as overflow on busy nights and as a private event space. Street parking available.
